entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then 40 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Snow level 1000 metres. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Rain mixed with wet snow beginning this evening. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with periods of wet snow early in the morning and ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 900 metres in the morning. High 8. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
